com.novartis.opensource.yada.format

Class ResultSetResultXMLConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.format.AbstractConverter
      • com.novartis.opensource.yada.format.ResultSetResultXMLConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter

    public class ResultSetResultXMLConverter
extends AbstractConverter
    The methods in this class use a ResultSet as source data and return it's content as an DocumentFragment containing ROW elements with nested data.
    Since:
    0.4.0.0
    Author:
    David Varon
